thedreamer:Absurdity.NAME: Absurdity
thedreamer:Absurdity.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an thedreamer:Abstract card, gain !M! Block.

thedreamer:Chimera.NAME: Chimera
thedreamer:Chimera.DESCRIPTION: thedreamer:Fantasy: Deal !D! damage twice. NL thedreamer:Reality: Deal !D! damage and draw !M!.

thedreamer:DeadWeight.NAME: Dead Weight
thedreamer:DeadWeight.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the bottom !M! cards of your discard pile.

thedreamer:DownToEarth.NAME: Down to Earth
thedreamer:DownToEarth.DESCRIPTION: thedreamer:Fantasy: Gain !M! Strength. NL thedreamer:Reality: Gain !M! Dexterity.

thedreamer:Dream.NAME: Dream
thedreamer:Dream.DESCRIPTION: thedreamer:Fantasy: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL thedreamer:Reality: Gain !B! Block. NL thedreamer:Fleeting.

thedreamer:FlowOfConsciousness.NAME: Flow Of Consciousness
thedreamer:FlowOfConsciousness.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL thedreamer:Awakening: Draw !M! cards.

thedreamer:Image.NAME: Image
thedreamer:Image.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL thedreamer:Awakening: Put this card into your hand.

thedreamer:Mirage.NAME: Mirage
thedreamer:Mirage.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block per enemy.

thedreamer:Narcolepsy.NAME: Narcolepsy
thedreamer:Narcolepsy.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of your turn, add 1 *Dream to your hand.
thedreamer:Narcolepsy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the beginning of your turn, add 1 *Dream to your hand.

thedreamer:Premonition.NAME: Premonition
thedreamer:Premonition.DESCRIPTION: Move the top card of your discard pile to your draw pile.
thedreamer:Premonition.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Move the top card of your discard pile to your draw pile.

thedreamer:Thought.NAME: Thought
thedreamer:Thought.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is shuffled, exhaust it.

thedreamer:ThroughTheMirror.NAME: Through The Mirror
thedreamer:ThroughTheMirror.DESCRIPTION: If during a choice, thedreamer:Reality is available, choose it twice. NL Remove *Wonderland.

thedreamer:Torment.NAME: Torment
thedreamer:Torment.DESCRIPTION: thedreamer:Abstract. NL thedreamer:Awakening: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

thedreamer:WakeUpCall.NAME: Wake-Up Call
thedreamer:WakeUpCall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Recall !M!. NL Does not activate thedreamer:Awakening effects.

thedreamer:Wonderland.NAME: Wonderland
thedreamer:Wonderland.DESCRIPTION: If during a choice, thedreamer:Fantasy is available, choose it twice. NL Remove *Through *The *Mirror.
